content.query:
PulseConnectSecure
| extend LoginResults = extract("^Login (failed|succeeded)", 1, Messages)
| where isnotempty(LoginResults)
| where Computer in ({VPNDevice}) or '*' in ({VPNDevice})
| summarize dcount(User) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Distinct User Login by VPN Device

content.query:
PulseConnectSecure
| extend LoginResults = extract("^Login (failed|succeeded)", 1, Messages)
| where isnotempty(LoginResults)
| where Computer in ({VPNDevice}) or '*' in ({VPNDevice})
| where User !endswith "$" and User !~ "SYSTEM"
| summarize count() by LoginResults, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
content.title: User Login Events by Time

content.query:
PulseConnectSecure
| where Computer in ({VPNDevice}) or '*' in ({VPNDevice})
| extend LoginResults = extract("^Login (failed|succeeded)", 1, Messages)
| where isnotempty(LoginResults)
| where LoginResults == "failed"
| where User !endswith "$" and User !~ "SYSTEM"
| summarize count() by User, Source_IP
| top 10 by count_
content.title: Top 10 Failed Login by User

content.query:
PulseConnectSecure
| where Computer in ({VPNDevice}) or '*' in ({VPNDevice})
| extend LoginResults = extract("^Login (failed|succeeded)", 1, Messages)
| where isnotempty(LoginResults)
| where LoginResults == "failed"
| where User !endswith "$" and User !~ "SYSTEM"
| summarize count() by Realm, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Top 10 Failed Login by User Realm

content.query:
PulseConnectSecure
| extend LoginResults = extract("^Login (failed|succeeded)", 1, Messages)
| where isnotempty(LoginResults)
| where Computer in ({VPNDevice}) or '*' in ({VPNDevice})
| where LoginResults == "failed"
| where User !endswith "$" and User != "SYSTEM"
| summarize count() by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
| top 10 by count_
content.title: Top 10 Failed Login by VPN Device

content.query:
PulseConnectSecure
| where Computer in ({VPNDevice}) or '*' in ({VPNDevice})
| where Messages has "Host Checker"
| extend OS = case(Messages has "Mac", "Mac OSX", Messages has "Windows", "Windows","Other")
| summarize count() by OS
content.title: Client Device Usage

content.query:
PulseConnectSecure
| where Computer in ({VPNDevice}) or '*' in ({VPNDevice})
| summarize ADPrimaryAuthSuccess = countif(Messages has "Primary authentication successful"), ADPrimaryAuthFailed = countif(Messages has "Primary authentication failed"), ADsecondaryAuthSuccess =countif(Messages has "Secondary authentication successful"), ADSecondaryAuthFailed = countif(Messages has "Secondary authentication failed")
content.title: Active Directory Authentication Status

content.query:
PulseConnectSecure
| where Computer in ({VPNDevice}) or '*' in ({VPNDevice})
| where Messages has "User Accounts modified"
| summarize UserAdded = countif(Messages has "Added with username"), UserRemoved = countif(Messages has "Removed username")
content.title: User Modification Status by Count

content.query:
PulseConnectSecure
| where Computer in ({VPNDevice}) or '*' in ({VPNDevice})
| where Messages contains "Radius Accounting"
| summarize ['Auth Success'] = countif(Messages has "Failed to send radius"), ['Auth Failed']=countif(Messages has "Successfully sent radius") by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
content.title: RADIUS Authentication Result by Time
